metadata.title: Vcansion Men's Outdoor Casual Stand Collar Vest Padded Jacket Coat Vest
features: Shell: 100% Polyester; Lining: 100% Polyester; Filling: 100% Polyester
Three Pockets - 2 side pockets and 1 inside pocket keep hands warm
Hand Wash / Dry Cleaning / Hang Dry / Do Not Bleach / Hang Dry.Stand-collar- Stand-collar design will increase your visual height and keep your neck warm.
Durable polyester fabric and parallel quilted design with fine sewing craft prevent leakage of imitation cotton stuffing

Nice looking warm vest is ideal to pair with tee shirts, heavy coats, jeans, sport pants, boots, or other casual wear for spring, fall or winter season, Occasion: Daily Wear, Work, Shopping, Holiday, Outing (Hiking, Cycling, Snowboarding, Skiing, Camping, etc.)
ATTENTION:all items are US SIZE for selection, not Asian SIZE.But few items tag shows the Asian Standard and old logo
description: Features: Shell: 100% Polyester; Lining: 100% Polyester; Filling: 100% Polyester Windproof: Yes Collor Type: Stand Collar Fabric TH: Thick; Layer: Three-layer Fabric Quilt: Parallel Quilted Closure Type: Two-way Zipper Closure Pockets: 3 Pockets -1 Interior Pockets & 2 Side Zipper Pockets Category: Quilted Jackets/ Winter Coats/ Thicken Cotton Jacket/ Windbreaker Alternative/ Padded Vest  Material Characteristics: High Quality - Durable nylon fabric and parallel quilted design with fine sewing craft prevent leakage of imitation cotton stuffing, making this quilted vest a best choose for your winter travel and casual wearing in cold weather. Lightweight and Soft - Refused to heavy, great for your outdoor pursuits, a vest to travel with or just as an emergency warm coat on your car.;  WEARING: Wear Outside - Ultra light fabric makes you relax when wearing this vest, lining with good quality polyester provides warmth. Great for outdoor activities like hiking, climbing ,traveling in spring, fall and early winter. Wear Inside - As for the super cold winter, this vest can be a layer wearing underneath a parker coat or skiing jacket to keep you warm.  Measurements(Inches); US S: Chest-44.9" Shoulder-18.8" Length-27.1"; US M: Chest-45.5" Shoulder-19.2" Length-27.5"; US L: Chest-47.6" Shoulder-19.6" Length-27.9"; US XL: Chest-49.2" Shoulder-19.9" Length-28.2"; US 2XL: Chest-51.2" Shoulder-20.3" Length-28.4";  Noted: The sizes come in US size. All conversions are approximate. Fits may vary by style or personal preference; sizes may vary by manufacturer.;
